definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
at a stride/taking large steps (while walking)

sentences.english: The teacher came striding into the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 老师大步流星地走进教室。

sentences.english: I've also learned that the Lord only asks that you go and you give your best for Him.
sentences.chinese: 我也学到主只要求你大步踏出去，为主做到最好。

sentences.english: He strode into the ocean, breasting the waves.
sentences.chinese: 他挺胸顶着波浪大步走进海里。

sentences.english: The third improvement is audio quality, which has taken a gigantic step forward.
sentences.chinese: 第三个改进是音质，这一点相较以前迈出了一大步。

sentences.english: You will make long strides in your career this year - as long as you keep faith in yourself.
sentences.chinese: 只要相信自己双子就会在职业生涯中会迈出一大步。

sentences.english: This time he got up from his chair and strode to the lectern confidently.
sentences.chinese: 这次他从座位上站起来，迈着大步很自信地跨上讲台。

sentences.english: This makes HIV testing to "regularize" a major step forward.
sentences.chinese: 这使艾滋病病毒检测向“常规化”迈进了一大步。

sentences.english: He strides over to the kitchen sink and flips on the faucet.
sentences.chinese: 他大步走向厨房的水槽并拧开龙头。

sentences.english: He strided the hall of the building, look for the exit.
sentences.chinese: 他在大楼的过道里大步走著，寻找出口。

sentences.english: The album represented a leap forward for the maturing singer.
sentences.chinese: 该专辑意味着这位日臻成熟的歌手向前迈进了一大步。

sentences.english: He strode confidently across the hall.
sentences.chinese: 他充满自信地大步走过大厅。

sentences.english: Cottrell strode out across the cobbled courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 科特雷尔穿过铺着鹅卵石的院子大步走出来。

sentences.english: And the above points are a great step forward for SNDA.
sentences.chinese: 上述各点是SNDA向前迈出的一大步。

sentences.english: He walked along the path with great strides.
sentences.chinese: 他在这条小路上大步流星地走着。

sentences.english: The men's long cloaks flapped around their ankles as they marched.
sentences.chinese: 两人大步行走，长长的斗篷拍打着他们的脚踝。

sentences.english: Per-pixel lighting is a major advance to photo-realistic images.
sentences.chinese: 象素光照是在向照片级真实感图像发展中的一大步。

definition: in big strides/(fig.) in giant steps
at a stride/taking large steps (while walking)
stride/to step (on the spot)/to mark time/at a standstill
to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
to mount (a horse, bike, flight of stairs, rickshaw etc)
